fullplot: A Jewish family in Germany emigrate short before the Second World War. They move to Kenya to start running a farm, but not all members of the family come to an arrangement with their new life. Shortly after their departure, things are changing in Germany very quickly, and a turning back seems impossible. So everyone has to arrange himself with the new life in a new continent.
plot: A German Jewish refugee family moves to and adjusts to a farm life in 1930s Kenya.
title: Nowhere in Africa

tomatoes.consensus: A visually lovely epic with compelling, three-dimensional characters.
